name: Hidden Object World Travel Pic
description:
Hidden Objects – World Travel is a beautifully designed Seek & Find game with 30+ Popular, Global Travel Destinations!

Explore New York, Hollywood, London, Paris, Italy, San Francisco, Africa, Australia, Ireland, Las Vegas, Florida, Hong Kong, Chicago, Texas, Seattle, and Washington D.C. 100’s of Objects to Find!

Find Worldly Travel themed objects like airplanes, suitcases, passports, New York pizza, Italian desserts, African Safari animals, Chinese food and more!

Explore some of the World’s Most Popular Travel Destinations without leaving your home! Enjoy the Louvre in Paris, NY Central Park, Santa Monica Beach, Hollywood Sign, London’s Buckingham Palace, Las Vegas Casino, Italy’s Venice Canals, Hong Kong’s bustling City, Washington Monument, San Francisco’s Cable Cars, and African Savannahs.

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Seek & Find, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure Around the World is sure to entertain! Safe travels!

Hidden Objects – World Travel features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics of Animals
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints

Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
